Designer and Doctor - w4m - 29 (north williamsburg)

(google map) (yahoo map)

age : 29 height : 5'8" (172cm) occupation : Graphic Designer status : single

You are a physician at an Urgent Care center in Williamsburg. You laughed when I said I was a Graphic Designer living in the area, since it seemed like everyone paying you a visit that day was as well. We debated the pros and cons of living in the East Village vs. Williamsburg and discussed the ideal of living alone versus the practicality of room mates. You brushed an eyelash off of my cheek.

I was immediately embarrassed telling you anything about my personal medical history and became more and more flustered and inarticulate with each question. I was wearing a green sweater and floral skirt, bare legs and cream oxfords, have straight cut bangs. I know you were just making conversation but I wanted to ask you to if you wanted to get a drink sometime. I wish you knew less about me.
  • do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers
